Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nervousness \Nerv"ous*ness\, n. State or quality of being nervous. [1913 Webster]

nervousness n 1: the anxious feeling you have when you have the jitters [syn: {jitteriness}, {jumpiness}, {restiveness}] 2: an uneasy psychological state; "he suffered an attack of nerves" [syn: {nerves}] 3: a sensitive or highly strung temperament
